Summary: 6 flashing light s that flashed one at a time very high, very big, and very bright. Far away and unexplainable
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Highlands Ranch
There were no other sightings in Highlands Ranch on or around January 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out the window when i saw a light that caught my eye. I saw it was a airplane but while i was viewing it, i saw 6 lights that all flashed in order from bottom to top in a pyramid form about 2-3 miles away then dissapeared. About 3 seconds later I alerted my sister and brother then they said it was nothing. I kept looking and again the same thing occured about 2 miles further than the previouse one. Then again until it was out of sight.
